https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yWfUWBxSWqIBigjnxb3zHNFkLuv.jpg Colosseum: Rome's Arena of Death aka Colosseum: A Gladiator's Story is a 2003 BBC Television docudrama which tells the true story of Verus a gladiator who fought at the Colosseum in Rome. Colosseum - Rome's Arena of Death
